attributes.action: make it law that pregnant and new mothers are made aware of sudden infant death syndrome and told about how they can help prevent it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my son died aged 6wk an 2days from sudden infant death syndrome at the time i did not really know what it was and i feel new mothers and pregnant women should be routinely told about the risks and advised on ways to help prevent sids i feel that if it was made law that it is an element in a ladys birth plan it will help reduce the 5500/7000 sids. works out at 1 an hour roughly this i feel would drasticly help reduce numbers
